ISSUE.TITLE: Fix typo field name embedding, should be doc_vector

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: replace non-word chars in uploaded filenames (#26022) fix: replace non-word chars in uploaded filenames Storage maintains a list of allowed characters, which excludes some characters used automatically by OSes for naming files (e.g., Mac default screenshot naming). To preempt errors, replace any characters that aren't alphanumerics, underscores, hyphens, or periods with underscores. See: https://forum.obsidian.md/t/unable-to-attach-screenshot-images-in-macos-14-0-when-wikilinks-turned-off-urlencode-u-202f-char/68410/6

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Update hybrid-search.mdx fix column name on documents table, fixes #26364 (#26365) * Update hybrid-search.mdx fix column name on documents table The function uses `doc_vector` but table is setup with `embedding` so changed it to `doc_vector` * Update col description in hybrid-search.mdx * Update hybrid-search.mdx back to `embedding` as col name
